patthana5.2:1.1_0: Sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana5.2:2.1_0: Adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana5.2:4.1_0: Sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto kusalo dhammo sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa kusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana5.2:5.1_0: Adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto kusalo dhammo adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa kusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.  (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana5.2:6.1_0: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe adhipatiyā cattāri …pe… upanissaye cattāri …pe… avigate dve. (Saṅkhittaṁ. Sabbattha vitthāro.)
patthana5.2:7.1_0: Sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana5.2:10.1_0: Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ. Sabbattha vitthāro.)

patthana5.2:117.1_0: Uppanno akusalo dhammo uppannassa akusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (Sabbattha ekaṁ. Sabbattha vitthāro.)
patthana5.2:118.1_0: Uppanno abyākato dhammo uppannassa abyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana5.2:119.1_0: Hetuyā ekaṁ, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… upanissaye tīṇi …pe… avigate ekaṁ. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)
patthana5.2:120.1_0: Paccuppanno kusalo dhammo paccuppannassa kusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (Sabbattha ekaṁ.)
patthana5.2:121.1_0: Paccuppanno akusalo dhammo paccuppannassa akusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (Sabbattha ekaṁ. Sabbattha vitthāro.)
patthana5.2:122.1_0: Paccuppanno abyākato dhammo paccuppannassa abyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana5.2:123.1_0: Hetuyā ekaṁ, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… upanissaye tīṇi …pe… avigate ekaṁ. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)
patthana5.2:124.1_0: Atītārammaṇaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca atītārammaṇo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana5.2:125.1_0: Anāgatārammaṇaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anāgatārammaṇo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana5.2:126.1_0: Paccuppannārammaṇaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca paccuppannārammaṇo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Sabbattha tīṇi. Sabbattha vitthāro.)
patthana5.2:127.1_0: Atītārammaṇaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca atītārammaṇo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana5.2:128.1_0: Anāgatārammaṇaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anāgatārammaṇo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana5.2:129.1_0: Paccuppannārammaṇaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca paccuppannārammaṇo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Sabbattha tīṇi. Sabbattha vitthāro.)
patthana5.2:130.1_0: Atītārammaṇaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca atītārammaṇo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana5.2:131.1_0: Anāgatārammaṇaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anāgatārammaṇo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana5.2:132.1_0: Paccuppannārammaṇaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca paccuppannārammaṇo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Sabbattha tīṇi. Sabbattha vitthāro.)
patthana5.2:133.1_0: Ajjhattaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ajjhatto kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana5.2:134.1_0: Bahiddhā kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca bahiddhā kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Sabbattha dve. Sabbattha vitthāro.)
patthana5.2:135.1_0: Ajjhattaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ajjhatto akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana5.2:136.1_0: Bahiddhā akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca bahiddhā akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Sabbattha dve. Sabbattha vitthāro.)
patthana5.2:137.1_0: Ajjhattaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ajjhatto abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana5.2:138.1_0: Bahiddhā abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca bahiddhā abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Sabbattha dve. Sabbattha vitthāro.)
patthana5.2:139.1_0: Ajjhattārammaṇaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ajjhattārammaṇo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Sabbattha dve. Sabbattha vitthāro.)
patthana5.2:140.1_0: Ajjhattārammaṇaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ajjhattārammaṇo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Sabbattha dve. Sabbattha vitthāro.)
patthana5.2:141.1_0: Ajjhattārammaṇaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ajjhattārammaṇo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Sabbattha dve. Sabbattha vitthāro.)
patthana5.2:142.1_0: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Sabbattha ekaṁ.)
patthana5.2:143.1_0: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Sabbattha ekaṁ.)
patthana5.2:144.1_0: Anidassanasappaṭighaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanasappaṭigho abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Ekaṁ.)
patthana5.2:145.1_0: Anidassanasappaṭighaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Dve.)
patthana5.2:146.1_0: Anidassanasappaṭighaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Tīṇi.)
patthana5.2:147.1_0: Anidassanasappaṭighaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho abyākato ca anidassanaappaṭigho abyākato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Cattāri.)
patthana5.2:148.1_0: Anidassanasappaṭighaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanasappaṭigho abyākato ca anidassanaappaṭigho abyākato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Pañca.)
patthana5.2:149.1_0: Anidassanasappaṭighaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho abyākato ca anidassanasappaṭigho abyākato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Cha.)
patthana5.2:150.1_0: Anidassanasappaṭighaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho abyākato ca anidassanasappaṭigho abyākato ca anidassanaappaṭigho abyākato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Satta.)
patthana5.2:151.1_0: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Satta.)
patthana5.2:152.1_0: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ abyākatañca anidassanasappaṭighaṁ abyākatañca dhammaṁ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Satta.) (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana5.2:153.1_0: Hetuyā ekavīsa, ārammaṇe ekaṁ, adhipatiyā ekavīsa …pe… aññamaññe cha …pe… avigate ekavīsa. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
